lines.text: This is the planet Mars. In the summer of 1954, this planet passed extremly close to Earth, so close that a cosmic force was disturbed and a baby intended for Earth was delivered to Mars, while a Martian baby went by mistake to Earth.
Mr. Wilbur, you may see your baby now. Mr. Wilbur?
[Mr. Wilbur wakes up to see he fell asleep reading a magazine story about martians]

[upon seeing the Martian baby for the first time]
Somebody goofed.
